title: How does Samsung’s Vision Booster feature work on the Galaxy S22 series?
content:
Samsung phones all have fantastic displays and the new Galaxy S22 series devices are no different. On paper, the Galaxy S22, Galaxy S22 Plus, and the Galaxy S22 Ultra all seem to have a great display. From high-resolution panels to adaptive refresh rate support, these smartphone displays have it all under their sleeves. But there’s

The post How does Samsung’s Vision Booster feature work on the Galaxy S22 series? appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung's new Galaxy S22 phones have a new display feature called Vision Booster. In this article, we'll tell you what is it and how it works.
